firstScreen.description: With a focus on physical storage and a secure digital archive, Iron Mountain provided climate-controlled, private vaults for physical artifacts and implemented a robust repository for digital preservation.
firstScreen.title: A partnership with Iron Mountain

secondScreen.stepFourDescription: Stored 1,000 cubic feet total of physical, historic assets in climate-controlled, private vaults
secondScreen.stepOneDescription: Digitized 786 videotapes (e.g., DVCPRO, Beta SP, MiniDV)
secondScreen.stepThreeDescription: Restored 33 hard drives (67 TB) featuring GRAMMY Award shows
